DormiDialogue: ^DORMI: Ahoy!! Hope you’re having fun with the festival!!
^CIELLE: Yeah it’s been pretty great! There’s so much to do and see!
^COSMO: I’m already exhausted and all we’ve done is float around!
^DORMI: It can be quite a lot yeah! But all the fond memories we can look back on makes it all worth it at the end of the day!
^CIELLE: I’ve been wondering, where does everyone go to sleep when the day IS over?
^DORMI: Well, the Pluvia tribe live in the forests nearby, the Calmaaj have their handy caravans, and us Marquina and Navemar sleep in the waters!
^CIELLE: So you guys sleep in the ocean?
^DORMI: Don’t be silly, we’d be swept away by the currents! See all those floating spheres in the sky? Those are levitation water pods that we create to sleep in!
^COSMO: I want one so badly! Just imagine relaxing in a nice, cool, floating pod in the sky. What’s not to love?!
^CIELLE: Cosmo, won’t you literally short circuit and explode if you get wet?
^COSMO: Cielle... don’t ruin this for me.
^DORMI: Hahaha! Well, you two have a great day exploring the rest of the market!
